name: Jalapeño Newt
description:
A newt took a chance and ate the wrong thing!

You can use a keyboard to play but a gamepad is recommended if you have one!

[NOTICE]

If the arrow controls don't work and it just moves the browser; try refreshing the browser, click on the game and THEN test the keys.

[CONTROLS]

  • Keyboard/Gamepad
  • Enter/Start = Pause
  • Arrow Keys/Left Thumbstick = Move
  • Space/A = Jump
  • Z/Right Trigger = Spray water

[REVIEW]

"IS THIS WRECK IT RALPH" - my younger cousin
